    _, err := svc.SendEmail(&ses.SendEmailInput{
        Destination: &ses.Destination{
            CcAddresses: []*string{},
            ToAddresses: []*string{
                recipient,
            },
        },
        Message: &ses.Message{
            Body: &ses.Body{
                Html: &ses.Content{
                    Charset: aws.String(CharSet),
                    Data:    aws.String(HTMLBody),
                },
                Text: &ses.Content{
                    Charset: aws.String(CharSet),
                    Data:    aws.String(TextBody),
                },
            },
            Subject: &ses.Content{
                Charset: aws.String(CharSet),
                Data:    aws.String(Subject),
            },
        },
        Source: sender,
    })
